projects.description: My first completed project on my tech degree journey. I made a random quote generator of some of my favourite football quotes. When you load this app, you will get a random quote, then if that bores you, you can wait 10 seconds for a different quote, or simply press the 'show another quote' button.

When you have hundreds, if not thousands of profiles of data. There is no way you want to scroll through them all. This app builds a dynamic pagination and filtering system to restrict the view of the user to less than 10, and give them the option to search through all the profiles to find the one you want.

This web form has multiple functionalities, it listens for errors, has collapsable and switching input fields depending on user interaction, as well as blocking event clashing errors, and the use of JavaScript regular expressions to ensure the user correctly enters their payment details or email address. This is a busy form and rather than going into more detail, I recommend you jump to view the live demo (to your right)

Using Object-Orientated Programming, I built a Movie Phrase Hunter game. The aim, to simply guess the movie I was thinking of when I built it. This app reacts to both button click and keyboard touches when playing the game, and will listen for correct and incorrect letter guesses, removing lives from the player if necessary.

This app demonstrates fetching an API from an external database and then displaying and filtering the fetched data depending on the webpage. This data fetches just 12 profiles, and when clicking on one of the fetched profiles, there is a modal window that allows your to see through all of the data in more detail. This app also has a search function added to it, you know... just in case.

This website was built for a start-up recruitment business based in England. With the opportunity to take on this project, I created this design, with the input and ideas of my entrepreneurial client. This site was built and designed from scratch, with the help of my favorite bootstrap components! Please view this site to see my design skills in full flow.
